data.question: What is the formula of the basic iron acetate used as a point of departure in the study?
What is the yield percentage of [Zn2FeII(O2CCH3)6(py)2] when basic iron acetate is reduced?
What solvent conditions favor the formation of [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4]?
How is [FeII2(O2CCH3)4(py)3]n obtained?
data.answer: By diffusion of Et2O into the original py/AcOH filtrates at 10 °C

data.question: What is the effect of adding a large excess of Et2O to the py/AcOH reaction filtrates?
What happens to [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4] and [FeII2(O2CCH3)4(py)3]n upon exposure to pure dioxygen or air?
What is the yield of red-black crystals of [Fe2.22(2)Zn0.78(2)O(O2CCH3)6(py)3]·py when [Zn2FeII(O2CCH3)6(py)2] reacts with dioxygen?
Is the reduction of basic iron acetate with Zn in py/AcOH (10:1 or 5:1) sufficient to afford yellow-green crystals of [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4]?
Does the addition of Et2O to the py/AcOH reaction filtrates always result in the formation of [FeII2(O2CCH3)4(py)3]n?
Can [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4] be obtained by treating basic iron acetate with iron dust?
Is [Fe3O(O2CCH3)6(py)3]·py directly formed by the reduction of basic iron acetate with Zn?
Does the reaction of [Zn2FeII(O2CCH3)6(py)2] with dioxygen in py/AcOH (2:1) yield only red-black crystals of [Fe2.22(2)Zn0.78(2)O(O2CCH3)6(py)3]·py?
Are species [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4] and [FeII2(O2CCH3)4(py)3]n related by equilibria?
Does the presence of AcOH and/or Et2O shift the pyridine-dependent equilibria in the order [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4] → [FeII2(O2CCH3)4(py)3]n → [Zn2FeII(O2CCH3)6(py)2]?
Is the conversion of [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4] and [FeII2(O2CCH3)4(py)3]n to [Fe3O(O2CCH3)6(py)3]·py upon exposure to air a reversible process?
What is the yield of colorless crystals of [Zn(O2CCH3)2(py)2] when [FeII2(O2CCH3)4(py)3]n is formed?
What is the role of Zn in the formation of [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4]?
data.answer: Zn acts as a reducing agent

data.question: Is the formation of [FeII2(O2CCH3)4(py)3]n dependent on the concentration of Et2O?
Can [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4] be synthesized from Fe(II) precursors?
Does the reaction of [FeII(O2CCH3)2(py)4] with dioxygen yield [Fe3O(O2CCH3)6(py)3]·py?
